review: Set-up was intuitive and easy and streaming is almost always seamless.  On a shared Uverse line you sometimes have to wait for buffering, depending on who else is online and what they are doing.  Pausing the playback for a minute or two usually allows complete playback without any more buffering delays.  There is a decent selection of materials on Prime without having to subscribe to another service, but if you're looking for the latest releases, you would need something more than Prime.  For my entertainment needs, it fits the bill.
